alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:46PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Graham County through 330 PM MST... At 245 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 29 miles southwest of Hannagan Meadow, or 36 miles northwest of Clifton, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point-Of-Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
